What's new: You can now preview your component using the keyboard shortcut Cmd+Enter.
You can now create components using the menus in the library panel.
Double clicking assets in your library now opens them instead of placing them on stage.
The app now automatically takes you to the definition of a component when you create one.
Fixes: Fixed rendering inconsistencies when switching back and forth between components.
Fixed several bugs causing events and actions from behaving correctly in preview mode.
Fixed several bugs with the "playback" property's behavior for controlling nested timelines.
